  A Muramasa  and a Masamune were stuck into the sand of a river bottom

A leaf was floated down the stream and the Muramasa blade, known for 
it's sharpness and bloodthirsty nature effortlessly cut the  leaf.

Another leaf was floated down but this time the Masamune blade, full 
of the good and honest spirit of the master swordsmith, did not cut 
the leaf instead letting it pass unharmed...

-t
